sect1.title: Download the bootscripts
sect1.para: Typing out all the bootscripts in chapter 7 can be a long, tedious process, not to mention very error-prone.

To save some time, the bootscripts can be downloaded from &http-root;/lfs-bootscripts/lfs-bootscripts-&bootscripts-version;.tar.bz2 or &ftp-root;/lfs-bootscripts/lfs-bootscripts-&bootscripts-version;.tar.bz2 .
